appendix.title: Documentation Updates
appendix.para: This chapter lists content changes for this document that apply to the current &productname; release.

listitem.para: Shifted the &dashboard; chapter () up one level in the book hierarchy so that its detailed topics can be searched directly in the table of contents.
The structure of was updated to match the current range of guides. Some chapters were moved to other guides (jsc#SES-1397).
